effects: Increase resistance to all elements by 40% for 3 turns to all allies
Reduce damage received by 30% to all allies for 3 turns
name: Hyper NulAll

desc_short.0: Boost all elemental resistances and reduce damage taken for all allies for three turns
desc_short.5: Aumenta la res. a todos los elementos y reduce el daño que reciben todos los aliados durante 3 turnos
